description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Crazy, dynamic and fun! Fight your friends and enemies in this old-school platform brawler game! Jump and dodge their weapons, find one yourself, throw it at them, watch it bounce, find a power-up and win! Two players required, three or four for maximum mayhem!
description.short: Crazy, dynamic and fun! Fight your friends and enemies in this old-school platform brawler game! Jump and dodge their weapons, find one yourself, throw it at them, watch it bounce, find a power-up and win! Two players required, three or four for maximum mayhem!
